Trans. Angela. To proof.
Is the list there? Melbourne botan Garden,

In reference to the proposed reduction of the employees of the botanic Garden, I have the honor of submitting a list, containing those still engaged here with a statement of their length of service and the duties allotted to them. I have also the honor to remark, that their work in their different portions is so varied, as to render a reduction according to juniority an impossibility, not every man being able to take an other ones work, special knowledge and experience being in each case requisite. In suggesting, what reductions might be made, I beg respectfully to enquire, whether the men indicated as those, with whose services I can best dispense, might not obtain employment in one of the parks under the board of lands and works or in the railway department.
